A '''dark prismarine slab''' is a [[dark prismarine]] variant of a [[slab]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Dark prismarine slabs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Dark Prismarine Slab
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|A3= Dark Prismarine
|B3= Dark Prismarine
|C3= Dark Prismarine

|type= Building block
}}

=== Stonecutting ===
{{Stonecutting
|Dark Prismarine
|Dark Prismarine Slab, 2
}}

== Usage ==
{{for|information about the placement mechanics of all slabs|Slab#Usage}}

=== Note blocks ===
Dark prismarine slabs can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.

== Sounds ==
{{IN|Bedrock}}, when a dark prismarine slab is combined into a double slab, the block's use sound is played.<ref>{{Bug|MCPE-79659}}</ref>
